idea-plugin.name: Make Targets
idea-plugin.description:
Quick access to Makefile targets with a convenient dropdown menu in the toolbar.

Features

  • Dropdown menu in the toolbar showing all available Makefile targets
  • Displays target descriptions from inline comments (e.g., build: # Build the project)
  • Executes targets directly in the integrated terminal
  • Configurable Makefile path in Settings
  • Works with PhpStorm, IntelliJ IDEA, and other JetBrains IDEs

Usage

  1. Configure your Makefile path in Settings → Make Targets
  2. Click the dropdown icon in the toolbar or use Tools → Make Targets
  3. Select a target to run it in the terminal
